alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 11:57AM MDT until May 04 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Emigration Creek in Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For Emigration Creek on the east bench of Salt Lake City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast Wednesday evening. * WHERE...Emigration Creek In Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 130.0 cfs, minor flood damage will impact homes and structures along Emigration Creek, including areas of the Hogle Zoo. At 169.0 cfs, Moderate flooding will affect select homes and structures along Emigration Creek. Additionally, structures in the Hogle Zoo will receive damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM MDT Wednesday the flow was 81.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 153.0 cfs this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood flow is 130.0 CFS. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued as needed, or by Thursday morning.
